name: ineqcomi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mpbi(wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2)
-| wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2)
-| wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2)
-| wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2)
-| wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin: |- wb(wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cin(c0, c1), c2)
-| wceq(cin(c1, c0), c2)

comment: Disjointness inference (when ` C = (/) ` ), inference form of ~ ineqcom . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 26-Mar-2017.)
